<NEW - DINOBOT>

DINOBOT took the time over to =

LATE small pockets of them to eliminate groupings cluster by cluster.  Igno=
ring the brawling leaders for now - that was the battle of the leaders, not=

What injuries he would take would hopefully be minor, and hi=
s superior skill would allow him to take on pockets of sharkticons one at a=
